\newcounter{c}
\stepcounter{c}
\thec: \roman{c}

\addtocounter{c}{3 * -(2+1)}    % 1 - 9
\arabic{c}

\setcounter{c}{ 3*\real{1.6} * \real{1.7 } + -- 2 }
\thec: \Roman{c}

\the\value{c}

\newcounter{a}[c]
\setcounter{a}{\value{c}}

\stepcounter{c}
\arabic{a}          % should be reset now due to stepcounter
\fnsymbol{c}
